Rulings.Edison:
●The Law of the Normal includes Tokens.
●The Law of the Normal also destroys all Spell & Trap Cards.
●The requirement to have 5 face-up Level 2 or lower Normal Monsters only has to be met when Law of the Normal is activated, not when it resolves.

Rulings.Base: 1. The "Law of the Normal" includes Tokens.\n2. The "Law of the Normal" also destroys all Spell & Trap Cards.\n3. The requirement to have 5 face-up Level 2 or lower Normal Monsters only has to be met when "Law of the Normal" is activated, not when it resolves.
